about_the_game:
• Expand your in-game domains with 1 additional plot of land.*
  • Unlock 2 additional character slots to explore, join other clans, or meet new friends.
  • Add the Hunters Lodge to your crafting options: 7 exclusive recipes (the Hunters Table, Bench, Blessing Triptych tapestries, Chandelier and Drinking Horn) that will add some flair to your interior.

By purchasing this upgrade, you are directly helping fulfill our vision of a living, breathing world that you can inhabit for years to come. Thank you for your support!


*Plots are valid for the entire duration of Early Access and might be subject to additional charges after release. Pax Dei’s Early Access is scheduled to last until at least June 2025, possibly longer.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.

detailed_description:
• Expand your in-game domains with 1 additional plot of land.*
  • Unlock 2 additional character slots to explore, join other clans, or meet new friends.
  • Add the Hunters Lodge to your crafting options: 7 exclusive recipes (the Hunters Table, Bench, Blessing Triptych tapestries, Chandelier and Drinking Horn) that will add some flair to your interior.

By purchasing this upgrade, you are directly helping fulfill our vision of a living, breathing world that you can inhabit for years to come. Thank you for your support!


*Plots are valid for the entire duration of Early Access and might be subject to additional charges after release. Pax Dei’s Early Access is scheduled to last until at least June 2025, possibly longer.

name: Founder's Pack Upgrade: Artisan

subs.option_text: Pax Dei: Upgrade to Artisan Founder's Pack - $19.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • DirectX: Version 12
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: SSD

short_description: Upgrade to the Artisan Founder’s Pack now to benefit from 1 additional plot of land, add 2 character slots to your account and unlock the Hunters Lodge recipes.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*
*languages with full audio support
